messages.text:
On Tue, Oct 18, 2011 at 6:30 PM, <mikioh.mikioh@gmail.com> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> os/inotify: move to exp/inotify
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5295044/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5295044/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/pkg/Makefile
>  M src/pkg/exp/inotify/Makefile
>  M src/pkg/exp/inotify/inotify_**linux.go
>  M src/pkg/exp/inotify/inotify_**linux_test.go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/Makefile
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/pkg/Makefile
> +++ b/src/pkg/Makefile
> @@ -184,7 +184,6 @@
>
>  ifeq ($(GOOS),linux)
>  DIRS+=\
> -       os/inotify\
>

You should still build it as exp/inotify on Linux.

Just change os to exp here?

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d47f02a68482 ***

os/inotify: move to exp/inotify

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5295044

LGTM

On Tue, Oct 18, 2011 at 6:42 PM, <mikioh.mikioh@gmail.com> wrote:

> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, bradfitz@golang.org (cc:
> golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> Please take another look.
>
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**5295044/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5295044/>
>

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On Wed, Oct 19, 2011 at 10:34 AM, Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org> wrote:

>>  ifeq ($(GOOS),linux)
>>  DIRS+=\
>> -       os/inotify\
>
> You should still build it as exp/inotify on Linux.

Oops, thx.

> Just change os to exp here?

PTAL.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, bradfitz@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

subject: code review 5295044: os/inotify: move to exp/inotify
